subject: Fwd: Order #SSN3961 - Baseplate not in the package
description_text:
There is another email on the homepage, so I sent the email again to the
email that is on the homepage. Sorry if you got it twice.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
Von: Pierre Hermenau <hermenau.pierre@gmail.com>
Date: Mi., 3. Dez. 2025 um 14:24 Uhr
Subject: Order #SSN3961 - Baseplate not in the package
To: <support@simsonn.com>


Order #SSN3961

Hello I'm from Germany, I got my package but without baseplate and
heelplate/heightening plate.

Is there another package coming or has it been forgotten?

conversations.body_text: ID 为 7337 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单7337  
      主题: Order #SSN3961 - Baseplate not in the package  
      描述:  Order #SSN3961   
 Hello I'm from Germany, I got my package but without baseplate and heelplate/heightening plate.  
   
 Is there another package coming or has it been forgotten?

Hi Pierre Hermenau,  ​We will ship your items separately because their packaging cannot be combined. Additionally, the processing of your order has been affected by a delay in the latest restocking at our warehouse. We are expediting your shipment, and we kindly ask for a little more patience. Thank you very much for your understanding and support.

Okay thanks for the info. I have no problem with waiting. I was just
wondering why the baseplate is missing and if it still comes separately in
a 2 package. Now I know.

Best regards
Pierre Hermenau

service@simsonn.com
Hi Pierre Hermenau,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Here is the link for your other package. There are no customs duties, so no need to worry.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047114881704
